docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: This package provides a way to implement asynchronous views in Django DRF.

docs.title: Create it
docs.text:
$ django-admin startproject example
$ cd example
$ django-admin startapp example

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
├── example
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── admin.py
│   ├── apps.py
│   ├── migrations
│   │   └── __init__.py
│   ├── models.py
│   ├── tests.py
│   └── views.py
├── example
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── asgi.py
│   ├── settings.py
│   ├── urls.py
│   └── wsgi.py
├── manage.py
└── requirements.txt
